title: Apple launches immersive tech lab Entrepreneur Camp for Latin founders
content:
Apple launched this week its inaugural Entrepreneur Camp for Hispanic and Latin founders. The company invited leaders and developers from nine app companies from the US, Brazil, Guatemala, and Portugal to “build the next generation of cutting-edge apps.”

more…

The post Apple launches immersive tech lab Entrepreneur Camp for Latin founders appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple launched its inaugural Entrepreneur Camp for Hispanic and Latin founders with developers from the US, Brazil, and Guatemala.
